channel.title: Demon slayer quest
channel.description:
Some information to those helping with the moparclassic project:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------Quest ID: (3) Demon slayer ----------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------
Quest Start: Gypsy
Npc Ids: ID: 14 Gypsy - coords: 134, 512 ID: 16 Sir Prysin - coords: 138, 474 ID: 18 Captain Rovin - coords: 140, 1398 ID: 17 Traiborn the wizard - coords: 215, 1635 ID: 35 Delrith - coords: 113, 551
Item Ids: ID: 25 Silverlight key 1 ID: 26 Silverlight key 2 ID: 51 Silverlight key 3 (::spawns:: - coords: 117, 3294 ID: 52 Silverlight ID: 50 Water ID: 20 Bones (quantity: 25 bones)
Object Ids: ID: 77 Drain - coords: 117, 461
Rewards: 3 quest points --------------------------------- Missing information: (none) complete... --------------------------------- Quest Notes: 1)spawn silverlight key 3 in sewer - coords: 117, 3294 after using bucket of water on Drain (stage 1).... ------------------------------------
NPC QUEST "Stages": ****NOTE: see pastebin links****
Gypsy: Talk to Gypsy (Stage 0): --------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/8N3Ceqsb Retalking to Gypsy (Stage 1):-------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/whddFrM6 Talking to gypsy after speaking with sir prysin (stage 2):----------------- http://pastebin.com/jbALBjVe Talking to gypsy after obtaining silverlight(stage 3):----------------------- http://pastebin.com/5132csh6 Talking to Gypsy after you complete quest(Stage 4):---------------------- http://pastebin.com/MQjBbqT9
Sir Prysin:
Talk to Sir Prysin (Stage 0):----------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/1gqKH3a8 Talk to Sir Prysin (Stage 1): ----------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/eGDxePCL Retalking to Sir Prysin (Stage 2):----------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/dBF0BaAF Talking to Sir Prysin with "individual Silverlight keys"(Stage 3):---------- http://pastebin.com/5CW5fiBv Talking to Sir Prysin with all 3 keys(Stage 4):-------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/4KFLr0vK Retalking to Sir prysin after he gives you silverlight(Stage 5):------------ http://pastebin.com/fkUEcN2j Talking to Sir Prysin after you complete quest(Stage 6):------------------- http://pastebin.com/QfcCcQnb
Captain Rovin:
Talk to Captain Rovin (Stage 0):------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/FLQ32ZS9 Talk to Captain Rovin (Stage 1):------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/j6x24bMF Retalking to Captain Rovin/after complete quest(Stage 2):---------------- http://pastebin.com/bKnEvS0w
Drain:
Searching Drain (Stage 0):-------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/zvCKBH2r Searching Drain (Stage 1):--------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/rZAseaZ5
Use water on Drain "before quest"(stage 0):-------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/dBz5RCHc Use water on Drain after talking to Sir Prysins stage 1(Stage 1):-------- http://pastebin.com/HJdTwJbi
Wizard Traiborn:
Talk to Wizard Traiborn(Stage 0):----------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ASLS5aPs Talk to Wizard Traiborn(Stage 1):----------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/J9U2a5QD Talking to Wizard with some bones, no bones, all bones(Stage 2):------ http://pastebin.com/prvri9cm Talking to Wizard after he gives you key (Stage 3):------------------------- http://pastebin.com/c62ctgq8
Delrith:
Attack Delrith(Stage 0)--- before quest----------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/9L2bxNhj Attack Delrith(Stage 1)--- unwielded silverlight------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/36sAvLik Attack Delrith(Stage 2)--- wielded silverlight---------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/pZcSMmxP Attack Delrith(Stage 3) ------quest completion ------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/U3w3ZuZb
-----------------------------------------------

item.title: Demon slayer quest
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

Some information to those helping with the moparclassic project:

------------------Quest ID: (3) Demon slayer -----------------------------

Quest Start: Gypsy

Npc Ids:
ID: 14 Gypsy - coords: 134, 512
ID: 16 Sir Prysin - coords: 138, 474
ID: 18 Captain Rovin - coords: 140, 1398
ID: 17 Traiborn the wizard - coords: 215, 1635
ID: 35 Delrith - coords: 113, 551

Item Ids:
ID: 25 Silverlight key 1
ID: 26 Silverlight key 2
ID: 51 Silverlight key 3 (::spawns:: - coords: 117, 3294
ID: 52 Silverlight
ID: 50 Water
ID: 20 Bones (quantity: 25 bones)

Object Ids:
ID: 77 Drain - coords: 117, 461

Rewards: 3 quest points

Missing information:
(none) complete…

Quest Notes:
1)spawn silverlight key 3 in sewer - coords: 117, 3294 after using bucket of water on Drain (stage 1)…

NPC QUEST “Stages”: NOTE: see pastebin links
